title: Remembering Betty White
author: CBS Sunday Morning
description:
The beloved actress Betty White, star of classic sitcoms and a perennial presence on TV, died Friday, December 31 at the young age of 99. Correspondent Mo Rocca looks back on the life of the Emmy-winner, and talks with "Mary Tyler Moore Show" creator James L. Brooks, and White's costar on "Hot in Cleveland," Wendie Malick.
